summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Commander Beetle Spirit
            - Section Title: Commander Beetle Location

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Commander Beetle Spirit

## Commander Beetle Location

The Commander Beetle can be found teaching a class just outside the Temple of Yellow Flowers in the Webbed Hollow. To find him, defeat Zhu Bajie and the Violet Spider and make your way out of the Webbed Hollow cavern. Pass through the Forest of Felicity and look to the right on the path to the Temple of the Yellow Flowers to find the Commander Beetle teaching his class."
            - Following Text: ""

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:
The preceding text describes the location of the Commander Beetle, who is found teaching a class near the Temple of Yellow Flowers in the Webbed Hollow. To reach him, one must defeat Zhu Bajie and the Violet Spider, then pass through the Forest of Felicity.

Image Summary:
The image depicts a scene where a character, possibly the Commander Beetle, is overseeing or participating in a martial arts class. Several figures are practicing sword techniques in an outdoor setting near a traditional building, which aligns with the description of the Commander Beetle teaching a class.

Following Text Summary:
There is no following text provided, so no additional information is available to elaborate on the image.
